scrm_task_err_notsignin: You must sign in with a SuiteCRM account to use this feature
scrm_task_err_notallow: You do not have permission to create tasks
scrm_task_err_connection: Failed to establish connection to SuiteCRM
scrm_token_placeholder: Enter your Rocket.Chat Personal Access Token
scrm_token_help: Go to My Account > Personal Access Tokens to create a new token
scrm_token_required: Token is required to access your account
scrm_setuptoken_help:
'⚠️ **Token Required**

' +'To create tasks in SuiteCRM, this app needs your Personal Access Token.

' +'**How to get your token:**
' +'1. Click on Avatar and Go to **Profile** > **Personal Access Tokens**
' +'2. Name it and Click **Create** to generate a new token
' +'3. Copy the token and paste it below

' +'*This token will be securely stored and only used to access your account.*'
